Ï€ (dig = 100 000 000)

Distirbution of difference's digits with different values of |p-q|

|p-q|=1 (e.g. p=0, q=1) -> {1873.06, {45024356, 5000671, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 4998118, 44976855}}
|p-q|=2 (e.g. p=0, q=2) -> {1981.69,{40002472,4999939,5001154,0,0,0,0,4999985,4999938,39996512}}
|p-q|=3 (e.g. p=0, q=3) -> {1909.,{40002292,0,5001227,4997216,0,0,4998696,5001226,0,39999343}}
|p-q|=4 (e.g. p=0, q=4) -> {2147.03,{40005961,0,0,5001613,5002250,4998310,5001612,0,0,39990254}}
|p-q|=5 (e.g. p=0, q=5) -> {2026.17,{39989174,0,0,0,9999923,9993478,0,0,0,40017425}}
